items.title: Achieving Research Impact
items.headline: The Co-Produced Pathway to Impact (CPPI) Framework for Planning and Evaluation of Research, KT, Commercialization
objectives_summary: Recognize and understand the different stages of the Co-Produced Pathway to Impact framework from research through dissemination, uptake, implementation and impact and how these stages in the research process can benefit from engagement with stakeholders

Project anticipated short-, medium- and long-term impact(s) of research, knowledge translation, and commercialization projects and apply this thinking to planning activities, outputs and outcomes accordingly
Use the Co-Produced Pathway to Impact framework to frame planning and evaluation for your research projects and/or programs toward achieving impact(s)

items.title: Job Hunting Made Simple: How to Get a Job with No Experience
items.headline: Get your unpaid/paid internship in the shortest amount of time possible.
objectives_summary: Get an unpaid internship in less than two weeks
Have employers looking for you instead of you looking for them
Uncover non-listed job & essentially creating your own job based on your own terms
